name: Bitsturbed
summary:
Bitsturbed is an old-school, action-driven, sci-fi, single-player first person shooter. Think health bar with health pickups, fast paced combat, shotguns, rocket launchers, exploding barrels and a mass of other retro mechanics in a mix of 2D and 3D FPS action!

Released for Windows (7, 8 and 10). With all Art, Programming and Design done by one man, me! Music done by a friend of mine, Scott Hunter.

The art for Bitsturbed has a number of influences, some legitimately retro (Megaman, Duke3D, Doom1+2), but also more modern games with retro themes ('The adventures of Square' being one awesome example).

The final game aims to be about an hour long, for an average playthrough.
